sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WrapUpInteractionAjaxUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>AJAX callable helper methods for Interaction Wrap Up feature</description>
        <name>WrapUpInteractionAjaxUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WrapUpInteractionAjaxUtil = Class.create();
WrapUpInteractionAjaxUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    isWrapUpEnabled: function() {
        var sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_recSysId');
		var intGr = new GlideRecordSecure("interaction");
        intGr.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
        intGr.query();

        if (intGr.next()) {
            return new WrapUpInteractionUtil().isWrapUpEnabled(intGr);
        }
        return false;
    },

    type: 'WrapUpInteractionAjaxUtil'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-02-18 20:46:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2350cc67731220106dfdbd49faf6a723</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WrapUpInteractionAjaxUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Interactions Management" source="com.glide.interaction">c6f449c36de620100acb70b35343307e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2350cc67731220106dfdbd49faf6a723</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-06-02 01:14:46</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>523</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
